ShopStyle | Senior DevOps Engineer | San Francisco, CA | Full-time | Onsite | https://www.shopstyle.com

ShopStyle is the worldâ€™s leading fashion search engine with the largest offering across 18 million products from more than 1,400 edited brands and retailers across the globe. By partnering with a curated selection of the best retailers and brands, our customers are confident in our search results covering every brand or store worth shopping, resulting in a smart, quick, relevant and inspirational shopping experience.

We're looking for a Senior DevOps Engineer with Python and AWS experience. More info (this lists San Mateo as the location, but SF is preferred):

https://talent.rakuten.careers/shopstyle/jobs/sr-devops-engi...

Email me at charles@shopstyle.com if interested.
